thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 47 of 564
thread.title: anonymous

author: anonymous
title: anonymous
text: I love the quality of Fabletics, and appreciate that promotional deals are a great bargain in and of themselves. However, I would be a much happier customer if it was possible to use store credit in addition to promotional deals or codes. Having to choose between which to use is a little frustrating. I've earned the store credit and would like to be able to use it for any order I'd like.
